segments.text: Hello ! Do you have a place where I can exercise ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . We have a fine exercise facility .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm happy to hear that . Now , would you tell me where it is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're actually standing above it . Just take the elevator or stairs down one level .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is the hotel going to charge me a dollar a minute for gym use ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , sir . There's no extra charge . All you need is your room key to open the door .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sir , you'll be pleased to know that our gym never closes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One more question , Do you have a trainer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We might be getting one in the near future . But at the present time , no .
segments.speaker: S2
